name: Riide, Inc.
description: Manufacturer of single-speed electric bikes designed for urban transportation. The company designs electric bikes and sells them as a subscription service that is lightweight, nearly silent to operate, and well-balanced, as well as offers add-on services like unlimited maintenance, theft insurance, and a lock, enabling users to commute without traffic, parking, or congestion.
one_liner: Manufacturer of single-speed electric bikes designed for urban transportation. The company designs electric bikes and sells them as a subscription service that is lightweight, nearly silent to operate, and well-balanced, as well as offers add-on services like unlimited maintenance, theft insurance, and a lock, enabling users to commute without traffic, parking, or congestion.
